prompts.name: enhanced_entity_extraction
prompts.template: Identify and list all named entities in the following text: "{text}". For each entity, provide its type (e.g., Person, Organization, Location, Date) and any relevant attributes or descriptions. Return the results in JSON format.

prompts.name: relationship_extraction
prompts.template: Identify and list all relationships between the entities in the following text: "{text}". For each relationship, specify the subject, predicate, and object. Return the results in JSON format.

prompts.name: temporal_extraction
prompts.template: Extract all temporal information from the following text: "{text}". For each temporal reference, provide the event, the date or timeframe, and any related entities. Return the results in JSON format.

prompts.name: sentiment_analysis_enhanced
prompts.template: Analyze the sentiment of the following text: "{text}". Identify which entities the sentiment is associated with and specify whether the sentiment is positive, negative, or neutral for each. Return the results in JSON format.

prompts.name: comprehensive_knowledge_graph
prompts.template: Analyze the following text: "{text}". Extract entities, their relationships, attributes, and temporal information to construct a comprehensive knowledge graph. Structure the output in JSON with separate sections for entities, relationships, attributes, and temporal data.
